name: César Iván Olvera Espinosa
title: Doctoral Researcher @ Aalto University
bio: Doctoral researcher in Cloud & Network Computing. I design carbon-aware AI inference systems that shift workloads in time & space to minimize CO₂e while meeting SLOs.

research_areas.name: Carbon-Aware AI Inference
research_areas.summary: Routing requests to low-carbon regions, time-shifting non-urgent jobs, and dynamic batching while preserving latency SLOs.

research_areas.name: Energy Profiling & Benchmarking
research_areas.summary: Measuring TTFT, TPOT, throughput, GPU power, and emissions with CodeCarbon & NVIDIA-SMI.

research_areas.name: Green Software Engineering
research_areas.summary: Patterns & metrics for energy-efficient software: caching, precision scaling, adaptive serving.
